list.s: [a bell tolls, Gibbs is interrupted from his drinking by the sound]
[Jack pries the bottle from Bootstrap's hand with a crackling sound]
[a loud thumping sound occurs, the two sailors freeze in fright]
[Jack goes into a hut, sees various supplies, the sound of buzzing flies is heard]
[Jones grabs Jack's hand, resulting in a squishy sound]
[a loud thumping sound resonates throughout the ship]
[with a deep rumbling sound, the Kraken's tentacles slowly crawl up the hull]
[the Kraken releases its hold, burned tentacles withdraw into the ocean, groaning sound]
[the kiss is inturrupted by the sound of shackles, Elizabeth has chained Jack to the main mast]
Fun for Families: Sound Opinions hosts a screening of School of Rock 4/15 w/disc tix for kids http://bit.ly/schoolofrock Don't forget! tomorrow!
